EVERYONE! I've solved the problem!!! If this is FREEZING ON YOU, it's because of your ANTI-VIRUS SOFTWARE!!! You have to shut it down!!! I'm currently using McAfee Security Center, and I can guarantee, this has no virus. The anti-virus software is impeding with the .EXE file. Just turn off your Anti-Virus software.
